1.content: Alright here we go, yet another giantess interactive, this time with video game girls. ALRIGHT, first question what game we delving into?
1.title: Start!

info.brief_description: This is where any and all video game giantesses can be found
info.description:
Ever wanted to play with a giantess from a video game? This is the place to be! Warning, +18 stuff will be allowed in this interactive, so watch out for your innocence!

Things allowed include:
Vore,
Digestion (You must be reborn afterwards)
Unbirth,
Futa,
Lactation,
Butt,
Breasts,
Feet,
+18

Not allowed:
Death,
Scat,
Farts,

I will be removing chapter that have bad grammer, or are only one sentence unless the chapter is simply serving the purpose of offering more routes for other people to take, so please be aware!
